short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tap counter by Meen Technology.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Track Anything with Tap Counter!

Looking for a simple yet powerful tool to keep track of counts? Tap Counter is here to make counting easier, faster, and more convenient! Whether you're counting reps, tracking inventory, or tallying attendance, this app has got you covered.
Features:

    - One-Tap Counting: Increment counts with a simple click/tap.
    - Reset with Ease: Quick reset options to start fresh.

Why Choose Tap Counter?

    - Lightweight and fast, with no unnecessary clutter.
    - Works offline, anytime and anywhere.
    - Perfect for sports, inventory management, surveys, habits, and more.

Download Tap Counter today and simplify your counting tasks with a tap
